div.p: We're a week into the "Syndie Hackfest" and there's been a great deal of progress! After years of drowning in the fetid swamp of neglect, our beloved Syndie is getting some much needed attention, resulting in many long standing bugs being fixed.

You can join the fun by pulling the code from Monotone from the i2p.syndie branch, or by trying one of the new installers built by kytv. Coding, testing, or even just making comments or suggestions would be great help.

Thanks to the hard work of zab, zzz, and str4d the Junit tests are all passing for the first time in years—if ever! Zab stuck with it until the very last test had been fixed. Thanks zab! And thank you to everyone that took part in reaching this milestone.
If you are one of the researchers running the I2P hosts on the 192.35.222.1/24 subnet, please get in contact with us on IRC2p, zzz.i2p or via email.
